Text: Agentbay ...SINCE YOUR COMMENTS ARE SO POSITIVE ABOUT THE MOVIE I DECIDED TO DOWNLOAD IT THANKS FOR TAKING FEW MOMENTS AND GIVE US YOUR OPINION ILL SEED AS SOON AS IM DONE DOWNLOADING.

A/9, V/10, fast dl, awesome copy,  I agree with Agentbay.  The sound is low, (so turn it up a bit) but still a great copy of a classic movie, 3 hours 15 minutes, overture of music at the beginning and intermission, thank you -Gabe- for sharing.

Thank you so much for this awesome copy! I played this file with VLC; there were many different subtitles available (English, Spanish, and French being a few). As mentioned before, the audio is slightly low so all you have to do is turn up the volume. 

A: 9
V: 10
